Analysis Structure HelpersÔÉÅ

Support helpers for structure analysis.

The helper subpackage contains streaming utilities, reference-structure builders, and memory estimation helpers used by the structure analysis services and calculators.

  • Analysis Structure Helper: Reference Structure Helper
  • Analysis Structure Helper: Residue Aggregation Helper
  • Analysis Structure Helper: Structure Calculation Helper
  • Analysis Structure Helper: Trajectory Service Helper
